hotels.title: Mountainside Retreat in Pauanui with Onsite Restaurant Above the Treetops, Heated Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Drive the winding roads of New Zealand’s Coromandel Peninsula, through miles of fern-lined native bushland, to arrive at this mountainside resort. Breathe in the fresh mountain air and take in lush forest scenery, while being only a two-hour drive from Auckland. Relax in the spa and sauna, lounge by the heated pool, or stay active with the onsite tennis court, fitness centre, and mountain bike rentals. After a day of adventure, sit on the sun-drenched deck of Miha restaurant to experience exceptional dining with views from above the treetops. Forget the hustle and bustle of everyday life and enjoy a retreat in the heart of New Zealand’s awe-inspiring mountain ranges.
